homeContent.h10first:
The e-scooter H10 is approved for
E-Scooter H10 is ideal for the way to work, this also in conjunction with public transport.
homeContent.h10second: With its low weight of only 14.8 kg and a max. motor power of 540 watts, you can cover a distance of up to 30 km.
homeContent.neon: Here you can learn more about the OKAI Neon in the eKFV and EU version.
homeContent.h20first:
The big brother of the H10 is the H20.
With an incredible motor power
of 1008 watts and its 48 volt 10.4 Ah lithium battery, the e-scooter brings it to a range of 42 km.
homeContent.h20second: Compared to the H10, the management of the motor and the installed battery stand out especially here.
homeContent.quad: The new Mini E-Quad SCOTEX Spike is an electric quad equipped with 4 pneumatic tires, powered by a 250W electric motor. The children's electric quad is suitable for children from 5 years
homeContent.wheely: The SCOTEX Wheely is an e-scooter in e-bike design for children. Due to the height-adjustable saddle, the bike grows with the child. The frame and tire size is suitable for children from 3 years.
